About Me

I am Sanjay Kumar J, an entry-level Cybersecurity Engineer with skills in Ethical Hacking, Network Security, Threat Detection, SIEM fundamentals, Python automation, and secure web development. Hands-on with Nmap, Wireshark, Burp Suite, Kali Linux & Metasploit. I focus on PQC, ML Security, Blockchain, and modern cyber defense. Passionate to work as a SOC or Security Analyst.
